items.title: Chartist talks: Ashish Kyal sees bullish momentum in Sakthi Sugars, Infosys resuming upward trend soon after current volatility
items.description: A break above the Rs 1,960 level can lift Infosys towards Rs 2,080, so long as the Rs 1,850 level holds on the downside.

items.title: Titan Q2 business update 'better-than-expected' on strong gold demand, say brokerages
items.description: Titan said consumer demand picked up momentum after the reduction in custom duty on gold imports from 15 percent to 6 percent.

items.description: Individuals faced the steepest losses, with a gross loss of nearly Rs 41,500 crore, SEBI's recent study shows

items.title: Macrotech Developers stock in focus on record pre-sales in Q2; Nomura reaffirms buy
items.description: Macrotech Developers stock are in focus as Nomura reaffirms its buy rating with a target price of Rs 1,600, after the realty giant reported its best-ever pre-sales in Q2FY25.

items.title: Lupin shares in focus on five observations from USFDA for Pune facility
items.description: Lupin Share Price | The company is addressing the observations comprehensively and will respond to the USFDA within the stipulated timeframe.

items.title: Antony Waste Handling shares in focus on contract win worth Rs 908 crore
items.description: Antony Waste Handling Share Price | The share touched a 52-week high of Rs 902.25 and a 52-week low of Rs 354.70 on 26 July, 2024 and 26 October, 2023, respectively.

items.title: MC Market Poll: High valuations, earnings disappointments biggest risks facing the Indian stock markets
items.description: Only around 20 percent of the respondents point to geopolitical tensions as the main factor weighing on the market.

items.title: Stock Market LIVE Updates: GIFT Nifty indicates a firm start; US, Asian markets gain
items.description: Sensex Today | Stock Market LIVE Updates: The Dow posted a record closing high on Friday and the Nasdaq ended with a more than 1% gain as a stronger-than-expected jobs report reassured investors who had worried the economy may be getting too weak.

items.title: Bandhan Bank stock in focus after healthy Q2 biz update
items.description: Bandhan Bank's board also approved a one-month extension of Ratan Kumar Kesh as the lender's interim MD and CEO. Jefferies believes the arrival of Kesh's successor will be a key catalyst in the lender's stock price action.

items.title: Agri Picks Report October 07, 2024: Geojit Financial Services
items.description: According to Geojit, The government has allocated INR 101 billion for the National Edible Oil Mission to make India self-sufficient in edible oils, Agriculture Minister Shivraj Singh Chouhan told a press conference in Bhopal, Madhya Pradesh, Friday. According to a press release issued by his ministry, Chouhan said the goal is for farmers to cultivate oilseeds across 1 million hectares annually.

items.title: CG Power shares rise on deal to buy Renesas' RF business
items.description: Under the agreement, CG Power will acquire intellectual property, equipment, inventories, and select employees

items.title: Godrej Properties stock jumps 2% on record bookings, collections in Q2FY25
items.description: Godrej Properties' shares surged on October 7 after reporting Rs 5,200 crore in Q2FY25 bookings, driven by strong demand from new project launches in NCR and MMR.

items.title: NBCC share price surges 4% as stock trades ex-bonus; 90 crore shares to be issued
items.description: NBCC (India) shares surged as the PSU stock traded ex-bonus, with the company set to issue 90 crore bonus shares in a 1:2 ratio.

items.title: As investments rise at Sun Pharma, watch out for impact on profit margins
items.description: The company has extended its agreement with Philogen to commercialise an immunotherapy drug globally

items.title: Chart of the day| What's driving logistic sector's growth
items.description: The logistics sector's size is projected to grow from an estimated Rs 9 lakh crore in FY23 to approximately Rs 13.4 lakh crore by FY28

items.title: Ambuja Cements stock gains 1%, HeidelbergCement India jumps 13% as Adani eyes Rs 10,000-crore buyout
items.description: HeidelbergCement India's potential acquisition is expected to significantly boost Ambujaâ€™s production capacity from the current 89 million tonnes, as the Adani group firm targets a capacity of 140 million tonnes by 2028.

items.title: AU Small Finance Bank shares gain 3% after healthy loan, deposit growth in Q2
items.description: AU Small Finance Bank's total deposits grew 12.7 percent on year to Rs 1.09 lakh crore while gross advances rose to Rs 96,030 crore in Q2.

items.title: Stock of the Day | Tarsons Products â€”  Is it good time to look at this healthcare proxy?
items.description:
Tarsons Products Ltd manufactures consumables for lab research, diagnostic centres, etc â€” a low-cost accessory for research but an essential one. Given the need to titrate the lab work with accuracy, purity and safety, this company warrants attention.
The company is undergoing a significant capex cycle which not only improves its revenue potential but also help its foray into high-margin lab product line.

items.title: Titan Company: Robust Q2 growth; healthy long-term prospects
items.description: Titan, a big organised jewellery player, will be the prime beneficiary of the market shift from the unorganised to the organised segment. Moreover, ramping up the non-jewellery business remains an additional growth trigger.

items.title: Kalyan Jewellers stock drops 5% amid rush to book profits after healthy Q2 update
items.description: The 40 percent run-up in Kalyan Jewellers stock in the past three months gave investors plenty leeway to take home partial profit, resulting in the selloff in the counter today.

items.title: Are bank deposits making a gradual comeback?
items.description: Quarterly updates of 11 banks indicate higher growth in deposits for the majority
